Oauth.password.name: Oauth.password
Oauth.password.help: The standard password for authed users. This is simply used to keep the auth component happy as the User has already been authenticated via Oauth

Comment.engine.name: Comment.engine
Comment.engine.help:
Configure the systems default commenting engine
Comment engines
    native - 42Viral's native comment engine (Default)
    disqus - A popular thrid party service

Disqus.shortname.name: Disqus.shortname
Disqus.shortname.help: If you have configured your site to use Disqus, set the short name here.

Disqus.developer.name: Disqus.developer
Disqus.developer.help: If you have configured your site to use Disqus, you may toggle in and out of developer mode.

Google.Apps.domain.name: Google.Apps.domain
Google.Apps.domain.help: The domain name of your Google Apps account. This lets us provide a Google Apps link from the site to your apps account.
